item.title: About
item.description: Intro Link to heading Hey! I’m Juan, a software engineer passionate about building backend systems. I work primarily with Go, PostgreSQL, and Kafka, but I’m always excited to dive into new technologiesâ€”especially when they make solving problems easier and more elegant. Love the challenge of finding the right tool for the job! Projects Link to heading NIStudies Link to heading fMRI neuroimaging studies explorer - A comprehensive platform for exploring and analyzing functional magnetic resonance imaging studies.
